reviews.review:
Вы не играли в портал и портал 2?

Как Вы только могли себе это позволить?
Это просто шедевр!
Однозначное присутствие в коллекции игр обоих частей.

Стоит своих денег, реиграбельная, атмосферная, интересная, необычная, захватывающая, супер-головоломка + куча карт в мастерской.

Valve may be horrible at deadlines and testing the impact of large updates, but when they do single player they do it perfectly. And the coop is excellent too.

The story is well written without being too simple or too complex. The core parts are there, but that's not enough. Yet Valve goes above an beyond the expectations. Yes, the events of the previous game, however few they were, have an impact. But we are also introduced to new characters. We get backstory for Glados, the villain, and she grows from learning her own story. But we also meet the new character of Wheatly. He's lovable in his incompetence, yet makes for an interesting character in the final act of the story. We also get to see the glory days of Aperture Science and their fall.

At the same time the environments greatly support the story, while at the same time being beautiful. The game may be five years old by this point, but the graphics still hold up. And amazingly, the game runs well on my craptacular Geforce 210. Yet, the visuals are never hard to read. You can always see what you need to see with no uncertainties. The overal quality of the graphics is a major improvement compared to the predecessor. It is hard to believe that it is the same engine.

The music is generally nothing special, if you think of it as something to listen to on its own. But it works magnificently as the background for the game. It really helps sell the experience that the visuals are offering. And as expected, there is a new ending song that is just as great as the previous one.

That leaves the gameplay. And Valve are incredibly good at singleplayer gameplay. This game is no exception. Puzzles are never too hard or too easy. You will understand what you did and how the puzzle was solved each and every time. The new gameplay elements work exceptionally well. Sure, each part on its own is rather simple. But that's how a good puzzle game should work. Each piece is simple, yet the puzzles keep on using them in new and interesting ways. One key aspect is how each puzzle element integrates with the core gameplay, the portal gun. Every single element works marvelously with the portal gun. You never feel as if the game has forgotten its core.

The coop is well worth playing, it's a major part of the content and is an excellent experience. The coop may be a different experience, but that's exactly what it needs to be. You are playing with another human being and the game wisely understands this, knowing how to adapt to not having your full attention at all times. But at the same time it knows what to keep. The puzzles are just as good as in singleplayer and fully take advantage of the existence of two players.

The built in level editor is a nice feature and is no mere extra. It is not a perfect replacement for Hammer (which is free anyway), but it offers all the tools a normal level author needs. You can't do every trick, but it trades the most advanced features of Hammer for ease of use. Hammer has a lot of flexibility that makes it troublesome to produce stellar results. The level editor on the other hand makes it impossible to make many common mistakes in hammer and makes it easy to produce a great result.

Overall, this game is exceptionally great and is a must play.

Obwohl dieses Spiel mittlerweile 5 Jahre alt ist, hat mich die Spielidee und die Story einfach nur umgehauen. Es ist einfach wahnsinn wie viel Humor in diesem unscheinbaren Spiel steckt. Teilweise sind einzelne Levels so ansrpuchsvoll, dass man schon mal 30 Minuten in einer Testkammer steckt. Die Wendungen in der Story runden das sehr gute Gesamtkonzept so ab, dass selbst die klügsten Köpfe am Ende mit dampfenden Köpfen dasitzen und einfach nur sprachlos sind. Meine Empfehlung: Kauft es euch! Es ist jeden Cent wert.
Trop bien surtout en coop.

Resumindo, portal 2 é portal 1 só que muito melhor, principalmente nos dialogos que são geniais. 

 Os puzzles deram uma boa dificultada, já que agora existem varios novos elementos como gels e "tuneis de gravidade" ou seja la como são chamados. Isso deixa o jogo interessante do começo ao fim, pois ele sempre esta introduzindo novas mecanicas.

 Meu unico ponto negativo para esse jogo são os cenarios, que apesar de estarem bem melhores e mais variados que no primeiro, continuam bem repetitivos e meio sem graça, mas acho que isso não tem exatamente uma solução já que eles são como são para ajudar no gameplay.

 Em suma, otimo jogo, superior ao primeiro, que ja era bom, tornando este um excelente jogo, vale cada centavo.

2011-2013-ish. Writes off internet Portal-craze as nerd obsession. Whatever.

2015. Buys portal package in summer sale. School starts. forgets. 

2016. Decides to finally give it a go. 

2016 +1hr. Portal is love. Portal is life. 

finishes game. Breaks down crying.
Spends rest of eternity watching/reading reflections and conspiracy theories about Portal.

1편과 마찬가지로 공간을 통한 퍼즐 게임입니다. 
전작보다 배경이나 스테이지, 스토리가 발전했습니다. 전작에 추가된
몇가지 기기로 인해 좀더 다양하게 봐야 클리어 가능하게 되었고, 기존 
연구소의 1편에 비해 다양한 환경이 마련되어 보는 눈도 즐거웠습니다.
스토리 또한 추가 AI를 섞어 재미나게 즐겼습니다.

1편을 즐기신 분이나 공간을 활용한 퍼즐을 즐기시는 분이라면 추천드립니다.

В интернете написана тонна отзывов, не буду повторяться. Игра и правда супер, и сюжет, и головоломки.
НО! Она реально глючит. Если свернуть - в большинстве случаев уже не разворачивается. Раза 4(!) за одно прохождение просто вылетала с ошибкой. Да, автосейвы работают нормально, и в большинстве случаев я ничего не терял из-за глюка, но перезапускать её каждый раз, когда понадобилось свернуть - реально надоело.

One of the most inovative games in the world only just went and inovated. New mechanics a ore involved plot tight writing all make for a fuller more moist slice of cake. 

But as with everything it's not what you give away it's what you hide that makes a game and inevitibly in revealing more about this universe valve looses some of the mystary but all the improvements that have been made are intuitive and fit in with the old gameplay mechanics and narrative well and we still hanker for more.

 How will portals work as a gameplay mechanic in an open wold we cry.

I'm not sure I can add anything to the massive collection of reviews.  This is my favorite puzzle game of all time.  I dream of a world where I have portal guns after playing this game.  I begin to think of the real-world physics of what would be possible, and I feel sad that I can't literally roll out of bed and land next to my fridge.  It's beautiful, challenging, rewarding, and I firmly believe it develops cognitive skills.  I would pre-pay for every sequel that will ever exist if they'd let me.

if you are bad at shooters like CS GO and blackops.
and if you are a little bit creative and if you are older then 10 then this is the perfect game for you.
the story is perfect, you should have 20+- hours of fun playing the story ( my network was down so steam did not record my hours). and then you can play with your friends and make puzzles. 

here a few tips.

1. play it with a steam or xbox controller.
2. put your sound on XD.
3. buy portal 1 for a great story ( you should really do it ).
4. think creative 
5. dont read spoilers it ruins it.

[b]Portal 2[/b] is a must-buy.
The single player campaign is excellent. The story feels like a really cool puzzle; while playing you start filling in these little details that make it even more awesome.
But the thing that just takes the cake in this game is the voice acting. Stephen Merchant and J.K. Simmons are just hilarious in their respective roles.
Valve did a fantastic job in every aspect of this game.
Probably one of the best puzzle games ever made.

I also love the fact that single-player and co-op have two completely different storylines (I haven't played co-op but I'm very excited).

¿Es posible hacer de una historia simple una de las mejores narrativas interactivas de la historia de los videojuegos?
¿Es posible hacer de una antagonista uno de los mejores personajes de la historia de los videojuegos?
¿Y es posible hacer todo esto en un juego de puzzles?

Portal 2 hace lo que nadie cree posible. Una obra que hace honor al significado de "videojuego" y que todo el mundo debería jugar. Una mezcla de puzzles, humor, emoción e interacción digna para el recuerdo.

Отличное продолжение отличной игры! Разработчики прислушались к игрокам и удлинили сюжетную линию, а также добавили множество неплохих нововведений. Рекомендуется для всех игроков, которые когда-то прошли Portal. Для людей, кто не проходил первую часть игры-головоломки нужно обязательно её пройти. Portal 2 - это лучшая головоломка за всю историю.
She told me not to take the box out of the room. I did it. 10/10 would rebel again.

GRAN GIOCO!
A parere mio meglio di Portal, giocato su secondo account.
Portal 2 è piu difficile ma allo stesso tempo possibile da completare, ricco di colpi di scena e molto più divertente dal punto di vista ironico rispetto a Portal.
In più qua vi sono nuove meccaniche come i ponti di luce ed il gel.
Non lo ho ancora finito ma sono davvero contento di averlo comprato.
